Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at 54th/Cermak
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between O'Hare and Rosemont
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Rosemont due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Rosemont due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Forest Park and Rosemont at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Rosemont and O'Hare to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time
